text:
Scheana Marie and Robert Parks-Valletta were planning to spend the holiday season together but unfortunately, the "Vanderpump Rules" star may be forced to make do without her ex-boyfriend. According to a new report, the longtime reality star recently revealed that she may not have enough free time in her schedule to enjoy spending Christmas with the actor and his family.

During an appearance over the weekend at the Z100's Jingle Ball in New York City, Scheana Marie spoke of her upcoming move to Las Vegas, where she will be starring in the hit show, "Sex Tips For Straight Women From a Gay Man," and revealed that the move may force her to cancel her holiday plans.

As she explained to E! News, the SUR Restaurant waitress is scheduled to be preparing to leave Los Angeles at the same time that she was supposed to be spending Christmas Eve with Robert Parks-Valletta.

The 'Pump Rules' star will be living in Las Vegas for several months

"I'm moving to Vegas for four to six months," Scheana Marie explained, adding that she is set to begin rehearsals around Christmas. "I'm hoping to make it to Christmas Eve with [Robert Parks-Valletta's] family but I have a big move ahead of me the next day."

Scheana Marie and Robert Parks-Valletta began dating about one year ago, but these days, they are only "friends with benefits." As the outlet revealed, the "Vanderpump Rules" star recently appeared on "The Daily Pop," where she explained their relationship status and revealed she had every intention of getting back together with her former boyfriend.

Scheana is still spending time with her ex-boyfriend

"We've been friends and in each other's lives for almost 12 years now, so that's not going to change anytime soon," Scheana Marie explained of her relationship with Robert Parks-Valletta on "The Daily Pop." That said, the next several weeks will be quite busy for the reality star, who will be spending the majority of her time reading and memorizing lines.

To see more of Scheana Marie, her ex-boyfriend Robert-Parks-Valletta, and their co-stars, including Jax Taylor, Brittany Cartwright, Kristen Doute, Stassi Schroeder, Tom Sandoval, Lisa Vanderpump, Katie Maloney, Lala Kent, James Kennedy, and Tom Schwartz, don't miss new episodes of "Vanderpump Rules" Season 6 on Mondays on Bravo TV.

As for "Sex Tips For Straight Women From a Gay Man," the show is set to begin sometime early next year.
